message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you the opportunity to purchase this product.  Given its unique value, I'm initially proposing a price of $2,000,000.  I'm confident this will be a worthwhile investment for you.
I appreciate the offer, but I was thinking more along the lines of $1,200,000. I believe that's a fair price for the product considering its value to me.
Bob, thanks for your counter-offer. I understand your perspective on the value.  To find a middle ground, I propose a price of $1,750,000.  This reflects the significant value this product offers.

I appreciate your willingness to find a middle ground, but I'm still a bit above my budget. I'm thinking more along the lines of $1,400,000. I'm confident that this is a fair price for the product, considering its value to me.
